name: Five Nights at Candy's 3 Scare Prank
name_original: Five Nights at Candy's 3 Scare Prank
description:
Use this app/game/whatever that I made in less than 30 minutes in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 to troll your friends and family! Disguised as a cat petting simulator, whoever you're pranking will be tasked with trying to pet the cat. But Shadow Rat from Five Nights at Candy's 3 (Credit to Emil Macko) comes out and fucking jumpscares them!

(Also it's open source for anybody who wants to dick around with it :/ )
